text: The 2019 Eastern Asian Men's Volleyball Championship was the 10th edition of the AVC Eastern Zonal Men's Volleyball Championship, the volleyball championship of East Asia. It was held in Zhangjiagang, China from 16 to 21 July 2019. On 21 July, China were the defending champions and won their second title. Yu Yuantai was elected the most valuable player. ==Competing nations== The following national teams participated: * * * * * * ==Venue== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center width=400 |- !colspan="1"| Zhangjiagang, China |rowspan=4 | |- |width=50%|Zhangjiagang Sports Center |- |Capacity: 3,750 |- |190px |- |} ==Round-Robin== * All times are China standard time (UTC+08:00). |} |} ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=180|Team |- align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center | 4 |style="text- align:left;"| |- align=center | 5 |style="text-align:left;"| |- align=center | 6 |style="text-align:left;"| |} ==Awards== *MVP: Yu Yuantai *Best Coach: Lu Weizhong ==References== ==External links== * Official AVC website Category:East Asia Volleyball Championship Asian Eastern Zonal Asian Eastern Zonal Category:International volleyball competitions hosted by China Asian Eastern Zonal Men's Volleyball Championship
title: 2019 Eastern Asian Men's Volleyball Championship
